name: Malefic Dimensional Gears
text:
1 Level 1 "Malefic" monster 
 If this card is Link Summoned: You can target 1"Malefic" monster that is banished or in your GY; shuffle that target into the Deck, and if you do, you can add 1 "Malefic" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only activate this effect of "Malefic Dimensional Gears" once per turn. If there is no face-up "Malefic" Fiend Spell: Destroy this card.
